steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 36-2012. Recovery of a 
16-year-old girl from trauma and burns after a car accident.

Sheridan RL(1), Schaefer PW, Whalen M, Fagan S, Stoddard FJ Jr, Schneider JC, 
McConkey B, Cancio LC.

Author information:
(1)Burn Unit, Massachusetts General Hospital, Boston, USA.
